alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 6:19AM MST until November 09 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm On Tap... .Areas of freezing drizzle are expected this morning. A winter storm will then move from the Rockies into the northern Plains through Thursday. It will spread a swath of precipitation into northeastern Wyoming and western South Dakota. Mostly snow is expected over northeastern Wyoming, the Black Hills and northwestern South Dakota. Freezing rain will occur east of the Black Hills tonight, but will change to snow overnight. Gusty northerly winds will develop late tonight into Thursday which will create areas of blowing snow and greatly reduced visibilities where accumulating snow falls. Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for the latest information, forecasts, and warnings. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas of freezing drizzle. * WHERE...Portions of southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
